attributes.action: Deselect MPs of ALL parties who refused to accept the majority vote on Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The News. The lies presented as fact by big business and biased media. MEPs, concerned for their own salaries. Is THAT the truth.
attributes.background: The UK claims to be a Democracy, but many of our elected MPs have in the case of the EU " leave " vote, acted against the whole idea of Democratic process in doing everything they can to derail a legitimate vote. It matters not whether you voted stay or leave, this is an attack on democracy itself.

rejection.details: This is a decision for political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
